channel.title: CVE Feed for dnsjava -- dnsjava
channel.description: The latest CVEs for dnsjava -- dnsjava

item.title: CVE-2024-25638|2024-09-04T14:24:37.774Z -- dnsjava -- dnsjava
item.description: dnsjava is an implementation of DNS in Java. Records in DNS replies are not checked for their relevance to the query, allowing an attacker to respond with RRs from different zones. This vulnerability is fixed in 3.6.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-25638|2024-07-22T14:05:29.278Z -- dnsjava -- dnsjava
item.description: dnsjava is an implementation of DNS in Java. Records in DNS replies are not checked for their relevance to the query, allowing an attacker to respond with RRs from different zones. This vulnerability is fixed in 3.6.0.
